name: Family Roots (Ecchi-Sensei, Saidrog, Jack98)
description: In this puzzle game the player has to place missed figures within the family tree. The player will have cards in hand, each card representing a character, each with its own description. Characters that are already within the tree can give hints about missing characters. Left mouse button, interact with tree boxes and cards. Right mouse button, you move around the environment and deselect the cards placed in the boxes. With the mouse wheel, you can zoom in
